sexual.name: Adult Content
sexual.description: Content which is sexual in nature.

violence.name: Violence
violence.description: Content which is violent or deeply disturbing.

intolerance.name: Intolerance
intolerance.description: Content or behavior which is hateful or intolerant toward a group of people.

rude.name: Rude
rude.description: Behavior which is rude toward other users.

curation.name: Curational
curation.description: Subjective moderation geared towards curating a more positive environment.

spam.name: Spam
spam.description: Content which doesn't add to the conversation.

misinfo.name: Misinformation
misinfo.description: Content which misleads or defrauds users.
